projects.title: Integrated Dashboard: YouTube & Expense Tracker
projects.tech_stack: Java, Spring Boot, React.js, MySQL, YouTube Data API
description_points: Developed a secure Full Stack dashboard featuring dual modules for financial tracking and media consumption, protected by a custom Login system.
Engineered the Expense Tracker module using Spring Boot and MySQL to categorize expenses and perform efficient CRUD operations.
Integrated the YouTube Data API to enable real-time video searching within the React UI, implementing seamless redirection logic for content viewing.

projects.title: AI Code Quality Reviewer Agent
projects.tech_stack: Python, Gemini API, GitHub Actions, REST API
description_points: Built an automated AI Agent integrated with GitHub Actions to review code on every Pull Request automatically.
Leveraged Google Gemini 2.5 Flash model to analyze code syntax, logic, and security vulnerabilities, providing instant feedback.
Reduced manual code review time by 40% and improved code quality by catching bugs early in the CI/CD pipeline.

projects.title: Automated Resume Tailoring Agent
projects.tech_stack: Python, Playwright, Gemini API, LaTeX, Automation
description_points: Developed a robust AI agent using Playwright to scrape job descriptions from complex career portals (Zscaler, IBM, etc.).
Implemented dynamic LaTeX generation logic that tailors the resume Summary, Skills, and Projects based on specific Job Descriptions.
Automated the end-to-end application preparation process, ensuring 100% ATS compliance and keyword matching.

projects.title: Rice-Grain Quality Analysis using ML
projects.tech_stack: Python, OpenCV, CNN, SVM, Image Processing
description_points: Designed an automated system for rice grain quality assessment integrating image processing with machine learning.
Trained classification models using CNN and SVM to extract features like size, shape, and texture with 95% accuracy.
Replaced manual inspection methods with a computer vision solution, enhancing consistency and speed.
